title: Solo/Duo Queue decay in about a week
body: Is Solo/Duo queue not available? I received a notification from riot that 8 days from now I will decay from my rank Plat-V unless a game is played, and the only ranked option I see in my client is Ranked Flex. Anyone can help me out?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Per the[ Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ), inactivity and decay is disabled and the notification is just lingering from the last season.  The current season hasn't started yet, so don't worry!
It impresses me how fast you respond to any non-"when does solo queue come out" question
Your soloQ rank will be soft reset anyways when the season starts.
